results.content: The instructor seems competent, but the examples are very syntetic (there is alot of jumping between subjects) and it makes it a little bit hard to follow for me. I think it would be more useful if these functional concepts were introduced in context of some project
results.content_html: The instructor seems competent, but the examples are very syntetic (there is alot of jumping between subjects) and it makes it a little bit hard to follow for me. I think it would be more useful if these functional concepts were introduced in context of some project

results.content: Great course, pretty well explained, but it could be improved with some exercises, quiz or anything that could help to practice what is learned. There is a lot of stuff to master in this course.
results.content_html: Great course, pretty well explained, but it could be improved with some exercises, quiz or anything that could help to practice what is learned. There is a lot of stuff to master in this course.

results.content: it´s a great content and really has a good perspective of functional programmimg... however... this are hard lessosn.... i´ve had to wath several times to figure it out.

results.content: I gained insight into the basic differences between the three flavors of computer programming.  I find this course a good match with my objectives.
